DOC.brief_title: Nasal Inhalation Dornase Alfa ( Pulmozyme ) Patients With Cystic Fibrosis Chronic Rhinosinusitis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( important ) : Subject confirm diagnosis cystic fibrosis . Subject chronic recurrent rhinosinusitic disorder . Subject 5 year old . Exclusion Criteria ( important ) : Subject critical condition ( FEV1 < 30 % SaO2 < 93 % ) . Subject ENT surgery within 6 month prior study .
